description: This drink will impress your guests whether you're having a dinner party or not. The Vermouth Cassis is made with&nbsp;dry vermouth and Crème de cassis in which its black currant flavor shines through, thanks largely due to the&nbsp;club soda—it gives this simple cocktail an extra pop!
name: Vermouth Cassis

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail glass with a few ice cubes, pour the dry vermouth and crème de cassis.
